page.title: 06ARCHAEOLOGY
page.content:
{ROMANO BRITISH:}A romano british settlement is known to have existed on both sides of the Clothall road. Some of this area is beneath modern housing housing development. Part of the area is currently being excavated prior to housing development.
All finds from the Baldock area are housed in Letchworth Museum. Ancient monuments, within the area are:- A settlement site south of Blackhorse Farm Baldock. A moated site west of Hooks Green Farm Clothall. Walls field Roman site Clothall. Enclosures and earthworks south east of Clothall bury.
